ygData.subject: Re: 8000 PLAT IN ONE PATCH! THANK YOU VERY MUCH!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: so is this a bannable offense?  have any GMs talked to you about this or have found your plat disappearing?  no one seems to want to answer this question.
ygData.messageBody:
so is this a bannable offense? have any GMs talked to you about this or
have found your plat disappearing? no one seems to want to answer this
question. guess i'll find out tonight when i go to buy combine weapons.

Keith C. Estanol / storm@... / Systems Administration
Linux / Quake2 Weapons Factory / Lawful Evil

On Tue, 27 Jul 1999, Manny Perez wrote:

> From: "Manny Perez" <mperez@...>
>
> Woohoo! Invested 100 plat in sketches and got a whooping 8k plat. Thanks for
> the tip!!!!
> Bought sketches at 1 sp each, and sold for 7 gp each!!! (Used 4 chars with
> 16 backpacks each)
>
> Thanks again,
